comments.creator: gbrown@mozilla.com
comments.author: gbrown@mozilla.com
comments.text:
This is trickier than just setting a pref in the profile because 'mach run' doesn't always build a profile. --disable-e10s uses a special environment variable instead of the pref.

https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/rev/4bb2401ecbfce89af06fb2b4d0ea3557682bd8ff/python/mozbuild/mozbuild/mach_commands.py#1106-1107
comments.raw_text:
This is trickier than just setting a pref in the profile because 'mach run' doesn't always build a profile. --disable-e10s uses a special environment variable instead of the pref.

https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/rev/4bb2401ecbfce89af06fb2b4d0ea3557682bd8ff/python/mozbuild/mozbuild/mach_commands.py#1106-1107

This option will make developer testing easier.

Tracking for Fission Nightly M6b.
